thread.title: Financial Planning and Analysis Associate at Excel Partners (Connecticut)
thread.title_full: Financial Planning and Analysis Associate at Excel Partners (Connecticut)

title: Financial Planning and Analysis Associate at Excel Partners (Connecticut)
text: Source: AllCountyJobs.com Industry leading company seeks to hire a creative, proactive Associate to join their FP&A team. Some responsibilities include but are not limited to supporting the company's budgeting, forecasting and expense management processes; assisting with streamlining and process improvement initiatives; measure accuracy of the forecasting and budgeting results and looks for ways to eliminate risk from the process. Position will also play a major role in the transformation and redesign of the teams' processes, systems and procedures. Interacting with various levels of management and several departments, the position offers a high level of exposure and visibility.
